project_abstract.cdata: The project would provide consultants' services to conduct surveys, complete the engineering design and prepare the contract documents for the construction of transportation, power, water, township and medical facilities. The consultants would also estimate construction costs, prepare time schedules, assist with the evaluation of bids and give such advice as is required. They would supervise the construction of the preliminary works. These works include site clearance, temporary offices, advance housing, temporary water and power supplies and the provision of the services of project coordinating staff during the design stage. The total cost is estimated at US$2.5 million, of which $1.8 million is for design.
